gridGeometry.CRS: PROJCS["@PROJ_NAME@", GEOGCS["WGS84(DD)", DATUM["WGS84", SPHEROID["WGS84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH]], PROJECTION["@PROJ_NAME@"], PARAMETER["semi_major", 6371200.0], PARAMETER["semi_minor", 6371200.0], PARAMETER["central_meridian", @PROJ_LON@], PARAMETER["latitude_of_origin", @PROJ_LAT@], @REMOVE_BY_SUBSTR,Equidistant_Cylindrical@ PARAMETER["scale_factor", 1.0], @END_REMOVE@ @REMOVE_BY_SUBSTR,~Equidistant_Cylindrical@ PARAMETER["standard_parallel_1", 0.0], @END_REMOVE@ PARAMETER["false_easting", 0.0], PARAMETER["false_northing", 0.0], UNIT["m", 1.0], AXIS["Easting", EAST], AXIS["Northing", NORTH]]
